personal_info.name: Kh. Abdullah Al Masud
personal_info.headline: Assistant Director - Supply Chain Management @ Walton Hi-Tech Industries PLC || MBA-IBA(JU) || AEM-BUET || EEE-MEC(DU) ||

about: To succeed in an environment of growth and excellence, earning a job which provides me satisfaction while achieving organizational goals. An energetic, motivated, self-disciplined, organized, responsible, hardworking individual with experience in the supply chain who loves working in a team as a leader or member. Enjoy meeting people throughout the world and making new friends along the way. I have a positive attitude toward life with positive thinking. I have powerful communication and interpersonal skill.

education.degree: B.Sc. Engineering, Electrical and Electronic Engineering (EEE)
